author: Special Correspondent
text:
GENERAL

SNS Group of Institutions: Junior Athletic Meet, Valedictory function and prize distribution, Nehru stadium,

4:30 p.m.

Kovai Kalaimagal College of Arts and Science: Lecture on “Vaasippum Nesippum”, Seminar hall, 1:30 p.m.

Sankara College of Science and Commerce: South Indian Management & Cultural Fest “Naya 2k16”, 8:30 a.m.

G.R. Damodaran Academy of Management: GRD Kwiz’16; GRDAM BIB (Business incubation bazaar), Conference hall,

10:30 a.m.

Ramalingam Chettiar Educational Trust: Commemoration lecture, T.A. Ramalingam Chettiar School hall, 11 a.m.

Sri Krishna Arts and Science College: National conference of ‘Bio revolution’, Seminar hall,

10 a.m.

Dr.N.G.P. Arts and Science College: Workshop on “The Sahyadri Freshwater Biodiversity Conservation”, Kambar Arangam, College premises, 9:30 a.m; Lecture on “Biotechnological approaches in Vaccine Production”, East Hall, 11:30 a.m.; Workshop on “Business Analysis and Decision Making”, 9:30 a.m.

Dr.R.V. Arts and Science College: English Literary Association Meeting, Seminar hall, 2:30 p.m.

Andhra Bank: Inauguration of the Saibaba Colony Branch (79{+t}{+h} branch in Coimbatore), N.S.R. Road, 11:30 a.m.
title: In Coimbatore Today
